tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE secure_data_transfer_protocols (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_system VARCHAR(255),
    destination_system VARCHAR(255),
    data_payload TEXT,
    transfer_status BOOLEAN,
    transfer_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE secure_data_transfer_protocols (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protocol_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL,
    data_transfer_speed DECIMAL,
    secure_connection BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    data_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_transfer_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    source_system VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    destination_system VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_size INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE secure_data_transfers (
    data_transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_system VARCHAR(100),
    receiver_system VARCHAR(100),
    data_payload BLOB,
    transfer_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_transfer_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transfer_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    source_id INT,
    destination_id INT,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    key_value VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    created_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    expiration_date TIMESTAMP
);
